requirements.description: You must provide a privacy policy for your Application that is easily accessible and linked from the Application.
The privacy policy must incorporate by reference and link to the Snap Privacy Policy.
The privacy policy should clearly and accurately describe to users what user information is accessed, collected, and stored by your Application.

type.summary: Information Access, Collection, and Storage Disclosure

requirements.description: The privacy policy must explain how and why the Application uses, processes, and shares user information with Snap and other third parties.

type.summary: Use, Processing, and Sharing Disclosure with Snap(Third-party partners)

requirements.description: While users may provide information directly to Snap, you must not provide Snap with any personal data unless agreed to in writing by both parties.
